web_snippets: David Nichtern (born 19 February 1948) is an American songwriter and television composer, soundtrack artist and Buddhist teacher of the Shambala tradition ...
Founder, Lead Teacher & CEO of Dharma Moon. David Nichtern is a senior Buddhist teacher who has been practicing and teaching meditation for over 40 years.
